reviews.review_msg: Interesting but hard course. Do not take classes with this prof if you are expecting an easy course. You have to earn that A. She expects that upper level students can think for themselves and does not baby people. She will help out on assignments but wont do them for you.

She is downright scary and intimidating! On the first class, she scared off all non-arch major students basically by telling them that they simply won't make it in her class. By the second class, there were only about 15 people left with an original class size of about 30. Very unapproachable and patronizing when I asked for help.

She's SCARY...no warm and fuzzy here people...The class was so disorganized, we never knew what to read, and she wouldn't tell us.  70% of the grade was the paper which she never talked about and 30% a power point.  She's obviously a smart woman, but doesn't mean she should be teaching!  I won't be taking anymore classes with her!
